For the guacamole: salt and freshly ground black pepper
For the salad: ½ avocado, peeled, stone removed, finely chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: To make the guacamole, place all of the guacamole ingredients into a food processor and blend until smooth.
To make the salad, whisk together the oil and vinegar in a bowl.
Add the tomato and avocado, season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper and mix together well.
To serve, place the salad onto a plate and spoon the guacamole around.
title: Tomato salad with guacamole
